parameters.content:
# Import camera products to Magento 2 Upload a file to this webhook url via a simple HTML form. Paste the below into https://codepen.io/pen/?editors=1000

Click on the "Choose File" button to upload a file:

parameters.jsCode:
let getRandomInt = function (min, max) {
  min = Math.ceil(min);
  max = Math.floor(max);
  return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min) + min); // The maximum is exclusive and the minimum is inclusive
}
let dto = {
      "attribute_set_id": 50,
      "price": 0,
      "status": 1,
      "visibility": 4,
      "type_id": "simple",
      "weight": 1,
      "extension_attributes": {
        "website_ids": [
          0
        ],
        "stock_item": {
          "qty": 10000,
          "is_in_stock": true,
          "manage_stock": false
        },
      }
}
let isGoodJson = function(jsonString){
    try {
        var o = JSON.parse(jsonString);
        if (o && typeof o === "object") {
            return o;
        }
    }
    catch (e) { }
    return false;
};
let isGoodAttribute = function(string) {
  let goodAttributes = ["name",
"sku",

"red_eye_reduction",
"live_view_shooting",
"audio_video_interface",
"frame_rates_in_video_modes"]
  let ret = goodAttributes.includes(string.toLowerCase().replaceAll(' ', '_'))
  return ret
}

for (const product of $input.all()) {
  if(isGoodJson(product.json["other_info"].replace(/'/g,'"'))) {
    let otherInfo = JSON.parse(product.json["other_info"].replace(/'/g,'"'))
    Object.assign(product.json, otherInfo)
  }
  let custAttrKeys = Object.keys(product.json).filter((key)=>{ return isGoodAttribute(key) })

  let name = product.json["Brand"] + ' ' + product.json["Product Name"] + ' ' + product.json["Model Name"]
  product.json.dto = {
    sku: name.toLowerCase().replaceAll(' ', '-').replaceAll('_','-'),
    name: name,
    custom_attributes: custAttrKeys.map((key)=>{ return {
          "attribute_code": key.toLowerCase().replaceAll(' ', '_'),
          "value": product.json[key]
    } })
  }
  Object.assign(product.json.dto, dto)
  product.json.dto.price = getRandomInt(100, 12000)
  product.json.dto.weight = getRandomInt(1, 10)
}

return $input.all();
